an5.145:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.145:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.145:4.4: Someone with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.145:5.1: Someone with five qualities is raised up to heaven
an5.145:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcohol and drugs that cause negligence.
an5.145:5.4: Someone with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
